bioAsHtml:
I’m a 32 year old guy married to a wonderful woman and together we are raising our wonderful sons.

I like playing board games, reading, skiing, talking with people, listening to people, helping people, working in the garden and goofing around with friends and family.

I’m also an experienced Java Developer, an ALM Coach, a Certified Scrum Master, an Atlassian Expert at RealDolmen and an international conference speaker with an interest in team building, social development and creating a better world for everybody.

acceptedTalks.title: Get Out of Your Comfort Zone!

bio:
